stimulusHtml: In designing the power figure (Nkisi n’kondi), the artist drew on the Kongo traditions of carving a hollow cavity in the area of the figure’s belly in order to
choicesHtml: contain the sunsum, which is another name for the soul of the people
serve as the figure’s spiritual center, where medicinal material is placed
guard ancestral relics that could be spiritually consulted when making important decisions
represent a particular man’s achievement and struggle for earned status
